name: Bug Crusher
description:
A game concept I tried out for a 1 week Game Jam. 2nd game I have created so far. I hope to polish it up and add more content in the future.

This is a physics based platformer. Roll and jump around the platforms squashing bugs. Roll into the purple square to complete the level and try not to fall off. Explore for bugs off the obvious path for a higher score.

Controls:

Up Arrow - Jump

 Down Arrow - Slam

Left Arrow - Roll Left

Right Arrow - Roll Right

Note: I am aware that the game crashes when changing levels and replaying the level after death. Currently working on a fix for this issue.
